BP reports: “Edward Kennedy, CB (1955); b 10 Oct 1911; educ Winchester and New Coll Oxford (BA 1933); U-Sec War Office 1954â64 and MOD 1964â71; m 6 Sept 1952 Patricia Iona Mary (d 1989), dau of W Howard Carrick and widow of Duncan George Stewart, CMG, and d 6 Nov 1983, leaving:

1e +Michael John; b 22 June 1953; educ Radley”

Will notes for Edward Kennedy Stopford

His probate index:

1984

STOPFORD, Edward Kennedy of Orchard House, Beaumont, Carlisle, Cumbria died 6 November 1983 Probate London 30 January Â£70731 8451101655Z

Will ordered to see if it gives any more clues about their son.

__________________

His wife Patricia Iona Mary Stopford was one of the executors, the other was a solicitor. The will was dated 27th November 1971 and his codicil was dared 26th September 1981. The net value of his estate was Â£70111.

In his will he named

1. his son Michael John and referred to three step-children.

2. His brother Captain James Coverley Stopford.
